tuv.seg: An outline of the courts and the offices that support them
Tá eolas anseo faoí na cúirteanna agus na hoifigí a thugann tacaíocht dóibh
The Children Court deals with children under 18 years of age and came into operation in 2002
Bíonn an Chúirt Leanaí ag déileáil le leanaí faoi 18 mbliana d'aois agus tháinig sé i bhfeidhm i 2002
The Children Act 2001 sets out the various rules regarding the Children Court
Leagann Acht Leanaí 2001 amach na rialacha difriúla maidir leis an gCúirt Leanaí
The District Court is organised on a regional basis and is the lowest court in the Irish court system
Tá eolas anseo faoin gCúirt Dúichet
The small claims procedure provides an inexpensive, fast and easy way for consumers to resolve disputes without a solicitor
Déantar cur síos sa doiciméad seo ar an chaoi a n-oibríonn nós imeachta um éilimh bheaga
European small claims procedure
Nós imeachta Eorpach um éilimh bheaga
The European Small Claims Procedure provides an inexpensive and easy way for someone to pursue a cross-border claim without the need to employ a solicitor
The European Small Claims Procedure provides an inexpensive and easy way for someone to pursue a cross-border claim without the need to employ a solicitor
The Circuit Court is a court of local and limited jurisdiction
Déantar cur síos anseo ar an gCúirt Chuarda
Find out where, and how matters are heard in this court
Tugtar eolas anseo faoín Ardchúirt
The Commercial Court provides efficient dispute resolution in commercial cases
Soláthraíonn an Chúirt Tráchtála taifeach díospóide feidhmiúla i gcásanna tráchtála
The composition and jurisdiction of the Special Criminal Court in Ireland is described
Déanamh suas agus dlínse an Chúirt Choiriúil Speisialta
The main function of the Court of Appeal is to hear appeals from the High Court and the Circuit Court
Is í príomhfheidhm na Cúirte Achomhairc éisteacht le hachomhairc ón Ard-Chúirt agus ón gCúirt Chuarda
Court of Criminal Appeal
An Chúirt Achomharc Choiriúil
The Court of Criminal Appeal was abolished
Tá an Chúirt Achomhairc Choiriúil a dhíothú
Criminal appeals are heard by the Court of Appeal
Éisteann an Chúirt Achomhairc achomhairc nua
Supreme Court of Ireland
Cúirt Uachtarach na hÉireann
The Irish Constitution makes provision for a Court of Final Appeal - the Supreme Court
Déanann an Cáipéis seo cur síos ar an gCúirt Uachtarach
Most Read in "Justice"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Dlí"
Alcohol and the law
Alcól agus an dlí
